about.title: Alaqariyya – A modern real-estate network for Moroccans at home and abroad
about.intro: Alaqariyya is more than a small local agency. It is a growing real-estate project built from real experience with the Moroccan market and with the needs of Moroccans living abroad who want a service they can truly trust.
about.storyText: The idea of Alaqariyya started from a simple observation: most people searching for property in Morocco face the same issues – incomplete information, unclear photos and little follow-up after the first call. We decided to build an agency that combines field experience, digital tools and human communication with one goal: clarity at every step.
about.forWhomText: We mainly serve families and individuals looking for a decent home, investors searching for properties with good returns and Moroccans living in Europe who need a trusted representative on the ground.
forWhomPoints: Residents in Morocco looking to buy or rent an apartment, house or shop.
Moroccans abroad who need someone reliable to follow up their files locally.
Investors who want realistic property opportunities in different Moroccan cities.

workSteps.title: 1. We start by understanding your real needs
workSteps.text: Before suggesting any property, we take time to understand your family and financial situation, your preferred city or area and the type of property that fits you.

workSteps.title: 2. Clear options, no pressure
workSteps.text: We send you suitable options with clear written information, real photos and videos when available, so you can decide calmly whether you are in Morocco or abroad.

workSteps.title: 3. Support from first visit to signed contract
workSteps.text: We assist you during visits, negotiation and the administrative side, explaining contract terms and all costs before any commitment.

whyPoints: Transparent information and pricing, without exaggerated promises.
Constant communication by phone, WhatsApp and email – especially for clients abroad.
Strong respect for time: organised visits, clear appointments and serious follow-up.
A team that combines field work with digital marketing, giving your property better visibility and better chances to sell or rent at a fair price.
about.statsTitle: What makes us different in practice?

stats.label: Multi-city coverage
stats.text: We are building a network that covers several Moroccan cities, with a plan to expand step by step.

stats.label: Remote-friendly service
stats.text: Full coordination for Moroccans abroad: visits, videos, documentation and regular updates.

stats.label: Quality over quantity
stats.text: We prefer fewer properties with serious follow-up rather than a big list with no real service.

about.closingText: Whether you live in Morocco or abroad, our goal is to make you feel safe and informed at every stage of your real-estate project. With Alaqariyya, we do not just “sell you a property”; we help you make a housing or investment decision that you and your family can feel comfortable with.

services.title: Complete real-estate services – from first call to keys in hand
services.intro: At Alaqariyya, we do not offer just one service. We guide you through a full journey: from the first conversation to the signed contract, whether you are an owner, a buyer, a tenant or an investor – in Morocco or abroad.

sales.title: Property sales
sales.text: We help you sell your apartment, house or commercial unit in the most efficient and transparent way possible.
bullets: Initial price guidance based on location and current market conditions.
A complete property file (photos, video, clear description, technical details).
Publishing your listing on multiple channels and filtering serious buyers.
Support in negotiation until both parties reach a fair agreement.
sales.bestFor: Owners who want to sell their property at a fair price without wasting time.

rentals.title: Rentals
rentals.text: Whether you want to rent out your property or find a place to rent, we help you match expectations on both sides.
bullets: Short-term and long-term rental options depending on your needs.
Clear explanation of the rental contract before signing.
Clarifying financial conditions (deposit, monthly payment, extra costs).
Follow-up for questions or issues in the first period after move-in.
rentals.bestFor: Owners and tenants who want a clear, respectful and organised rental relationship.

management.title: Property management
management.text: This service is especially useful for Moroccans living abroad and for owners who do not have time for day-to-day follow-up.
bullets: Handling calls and enquiries related to your property.
Organising visits and selecting tenants according to agreed criteria.
Sending you short, periodic updates on the status of the property and income.
management.bestFor: Any owner who wants peace of mind and regular visibility on what is happening with their property.

digitalMarketing.title: Digital real-estate marketing
digitalMarketing.text: Instead of a basic listing, we use digital marketing tools to make your property stand out and reach more of the right people.
bullets: Professional photo and video sessions for your property.
Targeted paid campaigns on the right platforms for your type of property.
Monitoring engagement and adjusting the campaign when needed.
Highlighting the strengths of your property honestly and attractively.
digitalMarketing.bestFor: Owners who want strong visibility for their property in both local and online markets.

services.processTitle: How do we handle your request?
services.processIntro: We try to keep our process simple and easy to understand, with no hidden steps or confusing jargon.

processSteps.label: 1. Free initial consultation
processSteps.text: We listen to your situation and your goal (sell, buy, rent, invest) and explain what is realistically possible in clear terms.

processSteps.label: 2. Clear action plan
processSteps.text: We agree with you on the next steps, the type of service that fits you and what you can expect from us and from the market.

processSteps.label: 3. Execution and follow-up
processSteps.text: We start working and keep you informed: enquiries, visits, offers, negotiation… until we reach the result you are aiming for.

whoPoints: Families looking for a decent home in a suitable area at a reasonable price.
Moroccans living abroad who need a trusted local contact in Morocco.
Property owners who want to sell or rent their assets in a professional way.
Investors who want realistic, analysed opportunities – not random listings.
services.closingText: Just contact us and tell us what you are thinking about: selling, buying, renting or simply asking for advice. We will suggest the most suitable service and move forward step by step, without pressure to decide quickly.

blog.metaDescription: Real estate articles and tips by Alaqariyya about buying, selling and renting properties in Morocco.
blog.heroSubtitle: Short, practical articles to help you understand the Moroccan property market and make better decisions when buying, renting or investing.
